name: Pac-Man Palace: Festive Folleys
description:
Just in time for Christmas in July, you can beat the heat with the Pac-Man Palace: Festive Folleys demo! It's a brand new Pac-Man experience. Run, jump, swim, bounce your way to the top but watch out for those pesky ghosts!

DISCLAIMER: This is a fangame. This is not related to Bandai Namco Entertainment. We do not own the PAC-MAN property. PAC-MAN and all of the related characters and materials all belong to BANDAI NAMCO Entertainment INC.
